Name: Trouble Inn: Jonny's Room
About the game: A fun adventure of monsters and magic! Follow your guide as he takes you on a journey to recover what was stolen. As another indie game hero on a vague quest for righteousness, you will: Throw Magic Rocks... Snap Magic Worms Save The World (With Magic)?
